content.body: Jack Works: I also don't think we actually need the note about `document.all` there in InvokeCustomMatcher; it's a bizarre legacy piece of the web platform that produces weird behavior *everywhere*. We're not particularly special here. ^_^
content.formatted_body: Jack Works: I also don't think we actually need the note about document.all there in InvokeCustomMatcher; it's a bizarre legacy piece of the web platform that produces weird behavior everywhere. We're not particularly special here. ^_^

content.body: (Tho also, in that example the second `if()` will only match if you write `null is f(let html, ...)`, since there will be more elements in the iterator than just the html element.)
content.formatted_body: (Tho also, in that example the second if() will only match if you write null is f(let html, ...), since there will be more elements in the iterator than just the html element.)
